original_text: The Lord has already prepared a place to burn the bodies of the dead people. It is ready for the king of Assyria! There is a place for him that is deep and wide. There is plenty of wood for the fire. The Lord's breath will be like a stream of hot sulphur. He will breathe out on the heap of wood and the fire will burn! The Lord has already prepared a place to burn the bodies of the dead people. It is ready for the king of Assyria! There is a place for him that is deep and wide. There is plenty of wood for the fire. The Lord's breath will be like a stream of hot sulphur. He will breathe out on the heap of wood and the fire will burn!
korean_text: 대저 도벳은 이미 세워졌고 또 왕을 위하여 예비된 것이라 깊고 넓게 하였고 거기에 불과 많은 나무가 있은즉 여호와의 호흡이 유황 개천 같아서 이를 사르시리라

sentences.original_text: The Lord has already prepared a place
to burn the bodies of the dead people
It is ready for the king of Assyria!
There is a place for him
There is plenty of wood for the fire
The Lord's breath will be like a stream of hot sulphur
sentences.korean_translation: 주님의 숨결은 뜨거운 유황의 흐름과 같을 것이다

sentences.original_text: He will breathe out on the heap of wood
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 장작 더미 위에 숨을 내쉴 것이다
